name: All the (active) sites using Webmention that I find so far [May 2022] - The Fantastic Site of Lord Matt
summary: It is one thing to have set up Webmention for your site (as I have) but quite another to then find someone to mention. This is why I have been keeping a list of all the Webmention enable sites I find. This is that list. Notes This is a list of everywhere I could find [â€¦]
